title: Genome-wide association study based on clustering by obesity-related variables uncovers a genetic architecture of obesity in the Japanese and the UK populations
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Ippei Takahashi, Hisashi Ohseto, Fumihiko Ueno, Tomomi Oonuma, Akira Narita, Taku Obara, Mami Ishikuro, Keiko Murakami, Aoi Noda, Atsushi Hozawa, Junichi Sugawara, Gen Tamiya, Shinichi Kuriyama
